Package com.mare.jovan

Interface IConnection

  • public interface IConnection
    Responsible for manipulation of users.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      EProcessResult addUser​(User user)
      Adds new user to users list.
      EProcessResult banUser​(java.lang.String username)
      Removes user from users list if user with given user name exists
      IStorage getStorage()
      Returns LocalStorage instance
      boolean isLoggedIn()
      Checks if any user has ongoing session with local storage.
      boolean login​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Sets current user value to user with matching user name and password
      void logout()
      Logs current user out of the ongoing session with local storage.
      boolean noUsers()
      Checks if there are any existing users

    • Method Detail

      • login

        boolean login​(java.lang.String username,
              java.lang.String password)
        Sets current user value to user with matching user name and password
        Parameters:
        username - the user name string
        password - the password string
        Returns:
        true if there exists user with matching user name and password; false otherwise

      • getStorage

        IStorage getStorage()
        Returns LocalStorage instance
        Returns:
        null if currentUser value is null;new LocalStorage instance otherwise

      • noUsers

        boolean noUsers()
        Checks if there are any existing users
        Returns:
        true if there are any exiting users;false otherwise

      • addUser

        EProcessResult addUser​(User user)
        Adds new user to users list.
        Parameters:
        user - a new instance of user
        Returns:
        enum value that determines whether the operation was successful or not

      • banUser

        EProcessResult banUser​(java.lang.String username)
        Removes user from users list if user with given user name exists
        Parameters:
        username - the user name string
        Returns:
        enum value that determines whether the operation was successful or not

      • isLoggedIn

        boolean isLoggedIn()
        Checks if any user has ongoing session with local storage.
        Returns:
        true if any user is logged in; false otherwise

      • logout

        void logout()
        Logs current user out of the ongoing session with local storage.
